thread.title: Taco emojis could finally be on the way
thread.title_full: Taco emojis could finally be on the way

title: Taco emojis could finally be on the way
text:
Taco emojis could finally be on the way Taco Bell has been trying to get the taco icon with petition Published On: Sep 09 2015 07:58:54 PM CDT Updated On: Sep 09 2015 08:12:48 PM CDT Tweet Kham Tran - www.khamtran.com/Wikimedia Commons 
Taco lovers in the tech world are rejoicing as Apple's iOS 9.1 beta gets released, USA Today reported. Related Content Apple to make 2 big announcements Wednesday By David Goldman 
The operating system now includes several new icons -- including the oft-requested taco, which had felt left out. After all, texters have been able to express their love for pizza and sushi for some time. 
For months, Taco Bell has been trying to make the taco emoji a reality with an online petition. 
Other highly-anticipated food emojis in the new system include a hot dog, cheese wedge, burrito, champagne bottle and popcorn. 
USA Today said iOS 9.1's wide release date hasn't been announced.
